comment: De Moivre's Formula. Proof by induction given at ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/De_Moivre's_formula , but restricted to nonnegative integer powers. See also ~ demoivreALT for an alternate longer proof not using the exponential function. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2007.)
